name: Quiz for Squid Game
description:
Whats new 8.19.4z?

*We have received a lot of feedbacks and most of them have difficulty with the levels. We have put a new skip button where if you have difficulty with the level you can click skip button and some ads will appear. Don't worry we just put it the ads in skip button and nothing else. We limit the ads so you can enjoy your game! There is a new level!

(You can contact us via email: lanzlutherstudio@gmail.com)

Several levels you can play this game.This is a fun quiz game that you can play anywhere. Are you as smart as player 456? You can play it even if you haven't watched the Squid Game but I recommend watching the Squid Game before playing this quiz game.Are you a true fun series of Squid Game? Play this quiz!Disclaimer: This application quiz is made by Squid Game fans and this is not Official Squid Game.Email us if there was any problem lanzlutherstudio@gmail.comYou can check our facebook page "Lanz Studio" for news/updates

(All images is from only NETFLIX)
